about_the_game:
Step into the ruthless world of lone archer warriors, where every battle is a fight for survival. In this unforgiving arena, every hero craves the blood of their enemy, and only the strongest will endure.


Master your combat skills and prepare to face wave after wave of relentless foes. Each battle is a test of your grit, as enemies will stop at nothing to see you fall. And be warned—one wrong move, and it’s back to square one.

But with every victory, you grow stronger, smarter, and deadlier. Unlock and upgrade powerful skills, combining them to create unstoppable strategies for the battles ahead. This is your chance to prove you’re the ultimate warrior.


No mercy. No second chances. Are you ready to show who’s boss? Dive in and fight like your life depends on it—because it does.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 or SteamOS
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU 1.2 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.10 (Yosemite) or later
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M or better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1 compatible with 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: CoreAudio compatible sound card
